name: Private Kyle Edwards
descriptions: Private Kyle Edwards is an NCR soldier turned ghoul found at Camp Searchlight in 2281. He is holed up in a Searchlight home northwest of the elementary school.
Private Edwards has been affected by the radiation caused during the Searchlight Sabotage when Legion infiltrators opened containers of radioactive waste stored in the Searchlight fire station.
He is currently trying to figure out how to move forward with his life, but he has no idea where to go, how to live as a ghoul,

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Go away.

topics.topic_text: You aren't feral are you?
topics.response_text: No, I'm not. Not yet anyway. I'm Private Kyle Edwards, former NCR trooper.

topics.topic_text: <Questions>
topics.response_text: I'm here because I have nowhere else to go.

topics.topic_text: <Questions>
topics.response_text: Are you sure about that?

topics.topic_text: <Questions>
topics.response_text: Yeah, I am. What of it?

topics.topic_text: <Placeholder>
topics.response_text: Not much, I'm afraid. What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: You should just go kill him.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I may be angry, but I'm not stupid.

topics.topic_text: Astor has agreed to let you join him.
topics.response_text: Maybe now I can get my old life back, or at least most of it.

topics.topic_text: Former? What happened?
topics.response_text: Couldn't you tell? That damn radiation bomb got me. I can't serve the NCR like this...

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Oh yeah, I'm sure he'd love to see you.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] I'm still not so sure about that.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: I suppose.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: I suppose.

topics.topic_text: What's the history of the camp?
topics.response_text: I know that this place was originally a mining town before the NCR took it over.  I think they mined gold before the war.

topics.topic_text: Maybe they'll let you back in?
topics.response_text: I'm not so sure about that. I don't know how the NCR feels about ghouls.

topics.topic_text: You're right, ghouls aren't fit to be in the army.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I know.

topics.topic_text: [Attack] Don't worry, I'll put you out of your misery.
topics.response_text: What?

topics.topic_text: On second thought, let me ask you something else.
topics.response_text: Alright.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: Later.

topics.topic_text: Can I have your dog tag?
topics.response_text: Sorry, I'm not about to give it up. It's the only thing I have left that reminds me of who I was.

topics.topic_text: You know, there's an NCR soldier outside who wants me to kill you for it.
topics.response_text: He wants to kill me? What did I ever do to him?

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: There must be someplace you can go.
topics.response_text: Believe me, I'd love to leave, but I can't because I don't know what effect the radiation will have on me.

topics.topic_text: Why haven't you gone feral yet?
topics.response_text: I'm guessing it's because I'm outside of the heavy radiation areas. I'm not going outside to find out, though.

topics.topic_text: Actually I have another question.
topics.response_text: Alright.

topics.topic_text: Now that you're free to leave you don't need your dog tag anymore do you?
topics.response_text: You're probably right. Here, take it.

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me what happened here?
topics.response_text: I don't really know the details of it, it all happened too quickly. I remember being hit by a blast of energy.

topics.topic_text: But ghouls are immune to radiation.
topics.response_text: Yeah, but I don't want to go feral, and that's probably what more radiation would do to me.

topics.topic_text: Is that the only thing you're afraid of?
topics.response_text: Radscorpions. Fuckers creep the hell out of me. I'm not going outside while they're still crawling around.

topics.topic_text: There's still radiation in your house.
topics.response_text: Look, just leave me alone. I'm not going outside.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you about something else then?
topics.response_text: Fine.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask  you something else?
topics.response_text: I suppose.

topics.topic_text: I'm positive, they're all gone.
topics.response_text: Maybe it's time for me to leave this place, then. Any ideas where I can go?

topics.topic_text: Well, there may still be a few out there.
topics.response_text: Nope, no way. I'm not going anywhere until I know they're gone.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> They are definitely all gone.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Sorry, I don't believe you.

topics.topic_text: You define who you are, not some dog tag.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Sorry, I'm not giving it to you.

topics.topic_text: Actually lets talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Ok.

topics.topic_text: I'll take care of them. Be right back.
topics.response_text: Thanks.

topics.topic_text: I want to talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Alright.

topics.topic_text: There are plenty of places out in the wasteland.
topics.response_text: You know what? Why the hell not. There are plenty of places out there to explore, and I'm kinda tired of being stuck in this house.

topics.topic_text: Maybe First Sergeant Astor will let you join him?
topics.response_text: Are you sure he'll be okay with it? Not everyone is crazy about ghouls.

topics.topic_text: You should work things out with First Sergeant Astor.
topics.response_text: I don't know if that's such a great idea.

topics.topic_text: I heard Ranger Station Echo up north is manned by other ghouls.
topics.response_text: There's a Ranger Station run by ghouls? Finally, I feel like I have a place to go. Thanks for your help.

topics.topic_text: Let's talk about something else first.
topics.response_text: Alright.

topics.topic_text: I'll go talk to him first.
topics.response_text: Really? Thanks, I owe you one.

topics.topic_text: On second thought maybe somewhere else would work better.
topics.response_text: Any ideas where I can go?

topics.topic_text: Lets talk about something else first.
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: It's either him or the wasteland.
topics.response_text: I think I'll take my chances with the wasteland.

topics.topic_text: Give me your dog tag, now!
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Bullying me won't make me give it to you.

topics.topic_text: He thinks you're suffering.
topics.response_text: Suffering? I may be suffering but I still want to live. You tell that bastard that I have every intention of doing so.

topics.topic_text: [Attack] You're a rabid dog that needs to be put down.
topics.response_text: I'll kill you for that!

topics.topic_text: Actually, I want to talk about something else.
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: Before I take care of them, can I ask you about your dog tag?
topics.response_text: What do you want to know?

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: Can I ask you something else?
topics.response_text: Sure.

topics.topic_text: Actually, let me ask you something else first.
topics.response_text: Alright.

conversation.response_text: What? How is that not bad? In fact, how could it get worse?
